B

BankAccount - Class in com.example
Represents a bank account with basic operations: deposit, withdraw, apply interest, and track a transaction history.
BankAccount(String, double) - Constructor for class com.example.BankAccount
Creates a bank account with a given name and initial balance.
BankAccountsManager - Class in com.example
Manages multiple BankAccount objects, providing methods for adding accounts, closing them, applying global interest, etc.
BankAccountsManager() - Constructor for class com.example.BankAccountsManager
Creates an empty manager for BankAccount objects.

C

closeAccount() - Method in class com.example.BankAccount
Closes the account, setting balance to zero and adding a transaction note.
closeAllAccounts() - Method in class com.example.BankAccountsManager
Closes all accounts by setting their balance to 0 and then clearing the manager's list.
